title: Bloomberg Markets: Bond Report, Eco Brief for Oct. 30

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Yelena Shulyatyeva\u0010Senior US Economist\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing the economy with Bloomberg Bond Reporter Taylor Riggs, who also discusses the daily bond report.
